text:
Created attachment 32522
proxy_html meta-refresh patch

Redirects within meta-tags like
<meta http-equiv="refresh" content="0; url='http://www.example.com'">
are not rewritten by mod_proxy_html.

By adding "ProxyHTMLLinks meta content" it is working for at least fully qualified URLs.
creator: Alexander_Pircher@yahoo.de

text: I'm reviewing the docs, and will add examples of ProxyHTMLLinks and ProxyHTMLEvents usage.
creator: nick@webthing.com
